text: evaye pita konda mata oba (næga) vadi vima sandaha, e mata oba (trptimatva vana andamata) vadi vuvahot obage deviyan pahala kala mema varaprasadaya matak kara, (me venuven oba ohuva næmada) “me mata (nægimata) saktiyak nomættan vasayen siti apata meya vasanga kara dun aya itamat parisuddhavantayeki” yayida
